title: Surrenders
body: We need to take away the surrender button. If people want to Afk or leave that is up to them and can get banned but for the rest of us wanting to continue that game we get outvoted???? Take that crap away we don't want it

replies.body:

>
> We?

Can you do me a favor please?
Look at the link in my comment and tell me when you would have voted to surrender.

> [{quoted}](name=antylope007,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Gn2AcAR5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-16T05:01:50.150+0000)
>
> Can you do me a favor please?
> Look at the link in my comment and tell me when you would have voted to surrender.

Still... we?
In reference to multiple persons, this is the correct term.
In the sense you are using 'we' it implies majority, and your point only applies to a very small minority....

Please report GigaPube, no doubt his abusive behavior and poor language extends beyond the forums.
Thanks :)

Agreed, just played a game with my brother who loves to surrender 5 minutes before the game ends. Here is the link to the game we played
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/111954885/201014932?tab=overview
If you'r going to vote surrender "because we have already lost" then why didn't you vote at the start of the match?
Tired of these people who give up when they think they are losing.
